statements: SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery;
SELECT machine_name, operation_hours FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery ORDER BY operation_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE operational_status = 'Operational';
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_schedule FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE operation_hours > 1000;
SELECT machine_id, operational_status FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE maintenance_schedule = 'Bi-Weekly';
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, operational_status FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE operation_hours > 1000 ORDER BY machine_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE operational_status = 'Operational' ORDER BY machine_name ASC;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, operation_hours FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE maintenance_schedule IN ('Weekly', 'Monthly') ORDER BY operation_hours DESC, machine_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT operational_status FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE operation_hours > 500 GROUP BY operational_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT AVG(operation_hours) AS average_operation_hours, maintenance_schedule FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE operational_status = 'Operational' GROUP BY maintenance_schedule HAVING AVG(operation_hours) > 800 ORDER BY average_operation_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery;
SELECT machine_id, machine_type FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE maintenance_due = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM OperationalData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, operating_temperature, energy_production FROM OperationalData WHERE operating_pressure > 100;
SELECT machine_id, installation_date FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery WHERE machine_type = 'Incinerator';
SELECT machine_id, machine_type, installation_date FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery;
SELECT * FROM OperationalData WHERE operating_temperature > 50 AND operating_pressure < 100;

SELECT machine_id, COUNT(data_id) AS data_count FROM WasteToEnergyMachinery LEFT JOIN OperationalData ON WasteToEnergyMachinery.machine_id = OperationalData.machine_id GROUP BY machine_id ORDER BY data_count DESC;
SELECT machine_id, MAX(energy_production) AS max_energy FROM OperationalData GROUP BY machine_id HAVING max_energy > 500;
SELECT machine_id, AVG(operating_temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(operating_pressure) AS avg_pressure FROM OperationalData GROUP BY machine_id HAVING avg_temperature > 60 AND avg_pressure < 150;
SELECT * FROM machinery_operational_data WHERE temperature > 50
SELECT machinery_id, pressure FROM machinery_operational_data
SELECT machinery_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'preventive'
SELECT MAX(vibration) AS max_vibration FROM machinery_operational_data
SELECT machinery_id, predicted_failure_date FROM predictive_maintenance_results ORDER BY predicted_failure_date ASC
SELECT * FROM machinery_operational_data WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY pressure ASC

SELECT machinery_id, temperature FROM machinery_operational_data JOIN maintenance_history ON machinery_operational_data.machinery_id = maintenance_history.machinery_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled'

SELECT machinery_id, pressure, vibration FROM machinery_operational_data INNER JOIN predictive_maintenance_results ON machinery_operational_data.machinery_id = predictive_maintenance_results.machinery_id WHERE confidence_level > 0.8
SELECT machinery_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM machinery_operational_data GROUP BY machinery_id ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC
SELECT machinery_id, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM maintenance_history GROUP BY machinery_id HAVING maintenance_count > 5
SELECT * FROM machine_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT machine_id, temperature, vibration FROM machine_data WHERE temperature > 50 AND vibration > 0.5;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT machine_id, inspection_date, maintenance_due_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM predictive_analysis WHERE prediction_date < '2021-12-31' AND predicted_failure LIKE '%imminent%' ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM machine_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM machine_data WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_logs WHERE machine_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT machine_id, inspection_date, maintenance_due_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM predictive_analysis WHERE machine_id = 2 AND prediction_date > '2022-10-01' ORDER BY prediction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Machinery;
SELECT machinery_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Machinery ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT machinery_name, location FROM Machinery WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT * FROM OperationalData WHERE sensor1_value > 50;
SELECT component_name, last_replacement_date FROM Components WHERE machinery_id = 1 ORDER BY last_replacement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Machinery WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT * FROM OperationalData WHERE sensor1_value > 100 AND sensor3_value < 50;
SELECT machinery_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Machinery ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MaintenanceLogs.*, Components.component_name FROM MaintenanceLogs INNER JOIN Components ON MaintenanceLogs.machinery_id = Components.machinery_id;
SELECT machinery_name, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM MaintenanceLogs INNER JOIN Machinery ON MaintenanceLogs.machinery_id = Machinery.machinery_id GROUP BY machinery_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
